title: Saezuru Doubutsu wa Yarushikanai!
original_name: 囀る動物はやるしかない！
sinopse:
Mini anime to promote the movie Saezuru Tori wa Habatakanai: The Clouds Gather, in which the characters turned into cats and dogs.

The BD/DVD includes the 25 episodes released on the official Twitter account, in addition to 5 new episodes.
